ygData.subject: Re: Lore Items
ygData.msgSnippet: That is true for higher level characters.  But if you are a newbie, its not true.  At least for the Tome of Discord.  I d put it in the bank, but it appeared
ygData.messageBody:
That is true for higher level characters. But if you are a newbie, its not
true. At least for the Tome of Discord. I'd put it in the bank, but it
appeared after I died and got reborn and a message that said "duplicate lore
item in bank deleted."



kale usi wrote:

> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> >From: "Blizzard" <blizzard15@...>
> >
> >If I get an item that is Lore, can I put it in the bank, and then >go get
> >another of the same Lore item, and still have them both, one >in in the
> >bank, one on me? Thanks.
> >
> >-Khadiar
>
> No. You can only have 1 of the same lore item either on yourself AND in the
> bank (either or).
>
